welcome.headline:
Créez des habitudes,

welcome.subheadline: Votre coach personnel IA de poche.

contract.subTitle: We've engineered a path optimized for your unique metabolic profile.
contract.projectionText: Leveraging your <bold>Yearly Vision</bold>, our neural engine predicts a <highlight>4.2kg</highlight> lean mass increase in <bold>12 weeks</bold>.

projection.muscle: Based on your current BMI of <highlight>{{bmi}}</highlight>, we predict a lean mass increase of <highlight>~4-6kg</highlight> in <bold>12 weeks</bold>.
projection.weight: Optimizing your metabolism could yield a <highlight>5-8kg</highlight> reduction in the first <bold>90 days</bold>.
projection.energy: Targeting sleep and nutrition patterns to increase daily energy levels by <highlight>40%</highlight>.
projection.mindfulness: Establishing a daily routine to reduce stress markers by <highlight>50%</highlight> in <bold>12 weeks</bold>.
projection.default: Our neural engine predicts optimized results in <bold>12 weeks</bold> based on your unique profile.
